summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Rihla Enterprise Cloud Platform new features. Backend achieved 100% success rate (21/21 tests). Frontend testing successful after fixing critical compilation error. All new features verified: multiple products per order, VAT checkbox, shipping charges, payment methods, editable categories, invoice with logo/QR code, and public invoice access.

fixed_bugs.issue: Entire file had escaped quotes in JSX (className=" instead of className=") causing SyntaxError: Expecting Unicode escape sequence
fixed_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Frontend would not compile at all, blocking entire application
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Removed all escaped quotes using sed command
